entities.description: Smoke the same number of cigarettes from day to day.
Number of cigarettes smoked per day often changes.
Have many cigarettes in an hour, then no cigarettes till hours later.
Number of cigarettes smoked per day influenced by other things.

Scale indicating levels of agreement from 'Not at all true' to 'Extremely true', with additional options such as 'Never used cigarettes', 'Did not use cigarettes in the past 30 days', 'Don't know', 'Refused', and 'Blank'.

relationships.description: Relates the question about smoking the same number of cigarettes each day to the possible responses.
Relates the question about the number of cigarettes smoked per day often changing to the possible responses.
Relates the question about having many cigarettes in an hour then no cigarettes for hours later to the possible responses.
Relates the question about the number of cigarettes smoked per day influenced by other things to the possible responses.
